warmups.title: Arm Circles
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms out to the sides.
Make small forward circles for 15 seconds.
Switch to backward circles for 15 seconds.

warmups.title: High Knees
steps: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
Run in place while lifting knees to waist height.
Keep core engaged and move arms naturally.

warmups.title: World's Greatest Stretch
steps: Start in a lunge position with right foot forward.
Place left hand on ground, rotate right arm toward ceiling.
Hold for a few seconds, return, then switch sides.
Do 5 reps per side.

warmups.title: Inchworm Stretch
steps: Stand tall, reach down and touch toes.
Walk hands forward to push-up position.
Hold for 2 seconds, then walk feet toward hands.
Repeat for 30 seconds.

warmups.title: Glute Bridge
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent, feet flat.
Lift hips up while squeezing glutes.
Hold for 2 seconds, lower down slowly.
Repeat for 10 reps.

conditioning.title: Shuttle Runs
steps: Set two cones 10 yards apart.
Sprint from one cone to the other and back.
Repeat for 30 seconds with rest intervals.

conditioning.title: Lateral Skater Hops
steps: Start in a half-squat position.
Jump laterally to the right, landing on the right foot.
Push off and jump to the left.
Repeat for 30 seconds.

conditioning.title: Jumping Jacks
steps: Start with feet together and arms at sides.
Jump while spreading feet and raising arms overhead.
Return to starting position and repeat for 30 seconds.

conditioning.title: Bear Crawls
steps: Start on hands and feet (not knees), hips up.
Crawl forward using opposite hand and foot.
Go 10 yards, then rest.
Repeat 2-3 times.
